The UK spent a record £9.05bn ($12bn) on home entertainment in 2020, with more than 80p in every pound going on digital formats, new figures reveal.
The biggest-selling video game was the latest Fif… [+2153 chars]

articles.title: From Shakespeare to drawing sausage dogs: the best TV for homeschooling - The Guardian
articles.description: With parents facing the prospect of more at-home education, the BBC and a plethora of YouTube creators have stepped up to help. Here are some of their best offerings
articles.content: If youre a parent of a school-age child, there is a good possibility that you have already experienced a few days of the endless waking hell that is home schooling. All of it is horrible. Sacrificing… [+4064 chars]
